column5: My place is close to:  20 miles from Galveston 30 miles from NRG Stadium 4 miles from Kemah Boardwalk 20 miles from Hobby Airport   I have most weekdays blocked, but that doesn't mean it isn't available. If you are wanting a day that is blocked, please send me a message and if available, I can unblock it for you.  My place is good for families (with kids) and big groups.
column8: Nice Home in Suburb of Houston
